document.full_text: iceland's credit ratings could be downgraded into "junk debt" status after its voters rejected a deal to repay britain and the netherlands for losses from a banking crash, standard & poor's said on wednesday.
document.title: iceland risks fall to "junk" status on icesave woe
lines_and_colors: iceland's credit ratings could be downgraded into "junk debt" status after its voters rejected a deal to repay britain and the netherlands for losses from a banking crash, standard & poor's said on wednesday.
